attributes.action: Why did the discs get lost
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Explain why your team are slack. How did you loose my details and what are you going to do if I get frauded, not to mention child TAX Credits mess you left me in CHEERS ?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
